title: Aaron Rodgers contract timing, Pettine makes Packers D dangerous (Football 05/10)
description:
Aaron Nagler of PackersNews.com joins Will Brinson to talk about the Green Bay Packers, break down the offseason under new GM Brian Gutekunst, examine the expectations of Mike Pettine's new defense, predict the timing of Aaron Rodgers' new contract, wonder about how the offense will look in 2018 and debate whether the Packers will over/under 10 games, plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
